name: Pablo's Secret
description: Legend has it that in the depths of the ocean there exists a treasure chest that pirates yearn for. It’s guarded by the octopus Pablo. Whenever something approaches it, Pablo waves his trident and shouts “Go away, go away! I’m ferocious!
effect: Auto Attacks trigger Tentacle Attacks. Auto Attacks damage increase by BaseLv×10. For refining ＋1 to +6, each level of refining will increase Auto Attack damage by BaseLv×5 (maximum at BaseLv×30),5% chance to gain 5 extra Zeny when slaying a target

name: Pacifier
description: A pacifier which can serve as a toy for little kids.
